page.title: 17LOCHARDIL & HOLM
page.content:
There are two private housing estates built on the outskirts of Inverness,in our square.They are called{LOCHARDIL}and{HOLM MAINS.}Most of the houses in Lochardil were built in the 50's to 70's and Holm Mains from 70's right up till today.We saw houses being built when we visited the area.Each lot of new houses extends beyond the existing town boundary.
We saw many lovely houses but not many shops, only one sub_post office grocery store for each estate. Lochardil also had a hotel. There was a swing park at Holm Mains and a rather neglected park at Lochardil. There is also a Community Hall and Scout Hut at Lochardil
